Uses of Class
uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.AbstractMediaPlayer

  • Packages that use AbstractMediaPlayer 
    Package Description
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player
    This is the main package for vlcj client applications, providing the classes necessary to create and control native media players and associated resources.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.direct
    Provides the classes necessary to support direct access to the native video frame buffer.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.directaudio
    Provides the classes necessary to support direct access to the native audio samples buffer.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded
    Provides the classes necessary to support the embedding of native media player video output in Swing/AWT user interface components.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.headless
    Provides the classes necessary to support the use of native media players that do not render video output locally - for example streaming servers.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.list
    Provides the classes necessary to create and control native media list players.

    • Uses of AbstractMediaPlayer in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultMediaPlayer
      Media player implementation.

      Subclasses of AbstractMediaPlayer in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.direct 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultDirectMediaPlayer
      Media player implementation that provides direct access to the video frame data.

    • Uses of AbstractMediaPlayer in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.directaudio

      Subclasses of AbstractMediaPlayer in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.directaudio 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultDirectAudioPlayer
      Media player implementation that provides direct access to the audio buffer data.

    • Uses of AbstractMediaPlayer in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded

      Subclasses of AbstractMediaPlayer in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultEmbeddedMediaPlayer
      Implementation of a media player that renders video to an embedded Canvas component.

    • Uses of AbstractMediaPlayer in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.headless

      Subclasses of AbstractMediaPlayer in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.headless 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultHeadlessMediaPlayer
      A media player implementation with no user interface component to render the video to.

    • Uses of AbstractMediaPlayer in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.list

      Subclasses of AbstractMediaPlayer in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.list

      Implementation of a media list player.
